title: Undergraduate Course Assistant

title: Software Engineer Intern

title: Software Development Intern

Designed the front end using React with Redux for state management and performed API integration of 10+ endpoints, followed by containerizing the application through Docker for easier deployment in an expansive micro-service architecture
